caption.p: Structure of the SARS-CoV-2 Spike (S) protein in its prefusion conformation (PDB 6VSB). (A) Cryo-EM structure of the trimeric and monomeric S protein and (B) domain architecture with colored domains and not resolved/missing regions in white. NTD, N-terminal domain; RBD, receptor-binding domain; FP, fusion peptide region; HR1/2, heptad repeat 1/2; TM, transmembrane domain S1/S2; S2â€²: protease cleavage sites. (C) Structural alignment of SARS-CoV-2 S (in orange and HR1 in dark-blue, PDB 6VSB) and SARS-CoV S (in gray, PDB 6CRZ).
